description: ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH 4 x ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND 1 x ROOFLIGHT TO REAR
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: [SHEETS 1 - 8 inclusive.]
Condition : 3 - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - REASON FOR APPROVAL.
The proposal involves acceptable design and scale with no undue impacts on neighbour or visual amenities. It accords with the Council's Adopted Unitary Development Plan, Core Strategy and London Plan Policies. The policies listed below were relevant to the determination of this proposal.
Core Strategy 2011 - CS14 Design
Adopted UDP 2003 - BE16 Urban Design, BE23 Alterations and Extensions, BE24 Roof Extensions and Dormer Windows
Condition : 5 - In accordance with paragraphs 186 and 187 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
